channel.title: Naming SaaS based on existing desktop product
channel.description:
I'm exploring options on how to name a SaaS that's essentially a web version of an existing desktop product with some additions. I incline to keep the brand - say, the software is named "Software" and possible names for the service are:
Software Cloud Software Net Software Online Software Live
Are there any good alternatives to Cloud/Net/Online/..., or alternative prefix (instead of suffix)? Maybe it's not good idea at all, and a new, unique name should be used, to avoid customer confusion?

item.title: Naming SaaS based on existing desktop product
item.dc:creator: Dmitry
item.description:
I’m exploring options on how to name a SaaS that’s essentially a web version of an existing desktop product with some additions. I incline to keep the brand - say, the software is named “Software” and possible names for the service are:

Software Cloud
Software Net
Software Online
Software Live

Are there any good alternatives to Cloud/Net/Online/…, or alternative prefix (instead of suffix)? Maybe it’s not good idea at all, and a new, unique name should be used, to avoid customer confusion?

Read full topic
